name: aspectcore
description: Guidance for AspectCore AOP framework for .NET Core. USE FOR: cross-cutting concerns via interceptors, method-level AOP, dynamic proxies, logging/caching/authorization interception, decorating service interfaces. DO NOT USE FOR: compile-time weaving (use PostSharp), full IL rewriting, non-DI scenarios, .NET Framework-only projects.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
